set.name: DMSD-12 Super GR Start Deck: Zero's Orega Moonless Sin

property.name: Type
property.value: Orega Aura

property.name: Race
property.value: Dolszak/Mafi Gang/Deletron

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GREAT SIN OF MOONLESS NIGHT} 2 (You may reduce the cost of using this aura by 2. If you do, destroy one of your creatures at the end of your turn.) ■ The attached creature gets "powered breaker". ■ When you attach this to a creature or whenever the attached creature attacks, choose one of your opponent's creatures. For each card in your graveyard, that creature gets -1000 power until the end of the turn. {OREGA AURA}: Attach this to one of your gacharange creatures, or gacharange summon and attach this to it. If that creature leaves the battle zone, this goes to the same zone, then the gacharange creature returns to the bottom of your super gacharange.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Super Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-12 Super GR Start Deck: Zero's Orega Moonless Sin

property.name: Type
property.value: Gacharange Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Mafi Gang/Deletron

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever your opponent chooses this creature by one of your opponent's spells or card effect, your opponent discards a card. (At the start of the game, gacharange creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your super gacharange, and if a gacharange creature would be put into a zone other than the battle zone, return them to the bottom of your super gacharange.)

If you do, destroy one of your creatures at the end of your turn.) ■ The attached creature gets "powered breaker". (A creature that has "powered breaker" breaks an additional shield for each 6000 power.) ■ Whenever your creatures are destroyed, you may draw a card. {OREGA AURA}: Attach this to one of your gacharange creatures, or gacharange summon and attach this to it. If that creature leaves the battle zone, this goes to the same zone, then the gacharange creature returns to the bottom of your super gacharange.

property.name: Type
property.value: Orega Aura

property.name: Race
property.value: Mafi Gang/Deletron

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this aura is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you attach this to a creature, choose one of your opponent's creatures. For each aura attached to this creature, that creature gets -3000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has power 0 or less is destroyed.) {OREGA AURA}: Attach this to one of your gacharange creatures, or gacharange summon and attach this to it. If that creature leaves the battle zone, this goes to the same zone, then the gacharange creature returns to the bottom of your super gacharange.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-12 Super GR Start Deck: Zero's Orega Moonless Sin

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put it into his mana zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-12 Super GR Start Deck: Zero's Orega Moonless Sin

property.name: Type
property.value: Gacharange Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Mafi Gang/Deletron

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top card of your deck. You may put it into your graveyard. (At the start of the game, gacharange creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your super gacharange, and if a gacharange creature would be put into a zone other than the battle zone, return them to the bottom of your super gacharange.)

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GREAT SIN OF MOONLESS NIGHT} 3 (You may reduce the cost of using this aura by 3. If you do, destroy one of your creatures at the end of your turn.) ■ The attached creature gets "powered breaker". (A creature that has "powered breaker" breaks an additional shield for each 6000 power.) {OREGA AURA}: Attach this to one of your gacharange creatures, or gacharange summon and attach this to it. If that creature leaves the battle zone, this goes to the same zone, then the gacharange creature returns to the bottom of your super gacharange.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMSD-12 Super GR Start Deck: Zero's Orega Moonless Sin

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put it into its owner's mana zone. Then choose a non-evolution creature from your opponent's mana zone. Your opponent puts that creature into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Mana Drive 3 (Darkness): If you have 3 or more cards in your mana zone and one or more of them is darkness civilization, this creature gets "slayer". (Whenever a creature that has "slayer" battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.) (At the start of the game, gacharange creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your super gacharange, and if a gacharange creature would be put into a zone other than the battle zone, return them to the bottom of your super gacharange.)
